Shiny modules to select colours

Source: R/app_color_picker.R
color_picker.Rd

This function allows to select different colours for an array of variables.

Usage

color_picker_ui(id)

color_picker_server(id, colors = NULL)

color_picker_demo()

Arguments

id

A string to identify the module.

colors

A list of variables and their default colours.

Value

A reactive list with the selected colours.

Examples

if (interactive()) {
    color_picker_demo()
}
